Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Beau Rivage, you'll be centrally located in Nice, steps from Place Massena and Quai des Etats Unis. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Verdure Theatre and Nice Opera.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 118 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and plasma televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature shower/tub combinations, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare. This hotel also features wedding services and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's beachfront restaurant, where you can enjoy drinks at a bar and dine alfresco (weather permitting). Or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a beach bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's beachfront restaurant, where you can enjoy drinks at a bar and dine alfresco (weather permitting). Or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a beach bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare. This hotel also features wedding services and a television in the lobby.

Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature shower/tub combinations, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

With a stay at Hotel Beau Rivage, you'll be centrally located in Nice, steps from Place Massena and Quai des Etats Unis. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Verdure Theatre and Nice Opera.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Place Massena - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Quai des Etats Unis - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Verdure Theatre - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Nice Opera - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Albert 1st Gardens - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Courthouse Square - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Promenade des Anglais - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Casino Ruhl - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Cours Saleya - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Nice Cathedral - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Place Rossetti - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Nice Etoile Shopping Center - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Quai Rauba Capeu - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Nice Theatre - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Castle Hill - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

The nearest airports are:
Nice (NCE-Cote d'Azur) - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Monte Carlo (MCM-Monaco Heliport) - 12.4 km / 7.7 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Beau Rivage is Nice (NCE-Cote d'Azur).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Hotel Beau Rivage is Nice (NCE-Cote d'Azur) - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Essential Information: Room 1

Hotel Tariff Notes: Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. CITY TAX: TO BE PAID BY THE GUEST DIRECTLY AT THE HOTEL. From Apr, 1 2017 to Sep 30,2017 - 2.25 Euro per person/ per day, From Oct. 1 2017 to Oct. 31, 2017 - 2.00 Euro per person/ per day Age 4-12, charge 50€ breakfast included. PRIVATE BEACH BEAU RIVAGE - Valid from April to October 2018 - Package at 20€ per per person per day (including mattress & beach towel), to be confirm for 2018 summer Umbrella : supplement 5 € Upon availability and weather conditions . CITY TAX: TO BE PAID BY THE GUEST DIRECTLY AT THE HOTEL. Supplement from November 1st 2017 to March 31st 2018 : 2 € per adult and per day From April 1st 2018 to September 30th 2018 : 2,25 € per adult and per day From October 1st 2018 to October 31st 2018 : 2 € per adult and per day Subject to increase by Government or City by-law.
